145:
Celtics can be an adjective that implies a noun. Example: "Boston Celtics" meaning the people of Boston who are Celtic in nature.

When used as a movie title, Celtics, as an adjective, implies a noun. Show the noun in a 20 yr  tv series, don't spell it out.
